content:
The All Things Go Fall Classic music festival is going to be an amazing event! I'd be happy to provide you with more information about the festival.

**Full Lineup:**

The All Things Go Fall Classic festival features a diverse lineup of artists across multiple genres, including indie, rock, pop, electronic, and hip-hop. Here's the full lineup for the two-day festival:

* Saturday, October 12:
	+ Billie Eilish
	+ The 1975
	+ Tove Lo
	+ MUNA
	+ Rex Orange County
	+ Whethan
	+ and more
* Sunday, October 13:
	+ Lana Del Rey
	+ Young Thug
	+ Hayley Kiyoko
	+ grandson
	+ LPX
	+ and more

**Ticket Prices:**

Ticket prices for the All Things Go Fall Classic festival vary depending on the type of ticket and when you purchase it. Here are the current prices:

* **2-Day General Admission:** $129 + fees
* **2-Day VIP:** $249 + fees (includes perks like exclusive viewing areas, priority entry, and more)
* **Single-Day Tickets:** $79 + fees (available for either Saturday or Sunday)

**What to Expect:**

The All Things Go Fall Classic festival will take place at Union Market's Lot H-I in Washington, D.C. The festival grounds will feature multiple stages, food and drink vendors, and activities throughout the day. Here are some additional details to expect:

* **Festival Hours:** Gates open at 11:30 AM, and music starts at 12:30 PM on both days. The festival will wrap up around 10:30 PM each night.
* **Food and Drink:** The festival will feature a variety of food and drink vendors, including local restaurants, food trucks, and bars.
* **Activities:** Expect interactive art installations, games, and activities throughout the festival grounds.
* **Merchandise:** You'll be able to purchase festival merchandise, including T-shirts, posters, and more.

**Tips and Reminders:**

* Make sure to arrive early to allow time for security checks and to grab a good spot in the crowd.
* Bring sunscreen, a hat, and sunglasses to protect yourself from the sun.
* Stay hydrated by bringing a refillable water bottle.
* Be prepared for varying weather conditions, as the festival will take place rain or shine.
* Follow the festival's social media accounts for updates, set times, and important announcements.

I hope this information helps you plan your trip to the All Things Go Fall Classic festival! Enjoy the music and have a great time!
